name: BeadBalancer
description:
Bead Balancer is a thrilling and adventurous game in which you have to control the bead without losing the balance and reach the end of the level without falling into the lava. The whole surrounding is full of hot and melting lava. You will fail the level if you fall down into the lava. Bead Balancer comes with smooth controls and is a stress free game. Hope you all really enjoy this game.

Thank You!
